message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great starting point, and I'm open to negotiations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid $900000 is still below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique value and quality.

I understand that the product is unique and valuable, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $1000000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
